== Mayannur (627723) ==

Mayannur is a village in the [[Talappilly]] taluka of [[Thrissur]] district with an area of 926 hectares and harbouring 1524 households with total population of 6660 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Ottappalam]] is at a distance of 5 km. Male population is 3218 and female population is 3442. Scheduled Caste Population is 853 and Scheduled Tribes population is 10. Census Location Code of the village is 627723<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.
